Review the proposed replacement of DLA with PIP. Measuring disabilties with an arbartiary point system does not reflect the true nature of disabilities. The DWP should take more notice of medical professionals who are treating disabled people.
The new changes are going to cost the Tax Payer more money and cause more stress to the vulnerable of society at a time of great financial strain.
The Govenment should make sure the most vulnerable are always protected with each benefit change.
